title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 342: Featuring Georges Laraque + Teddy Purcell
description:
On Episode 342 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Georges Laraque and Teddy Purcell. Teddy joined (00:08:30) to talk Tampa-Montreal, recap Game 4, discuss his days in Tampa and tons more. The guys also touch on all the NHL news around the league, including the Viktor Arvidsson deal. The boys are then joined by Georges (01:54:34), to talk all things Montreal, his playing career, fighting and more. The guys wrap up talking some golf, ESPN, Barstool Athletes and more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
